name: JavaAtomParser
short_description: "JavaAtomParser" is a Java-framework, which allows to parse Atom-feeds from various input streams. The framework's interface is designed to be as elemental as possible, but also to take the complete specifications into consideration. Furthermore the parsing is implemented to be backward-compatible, to support older versions of the Atom specification.
summary: A Java-framework, which allows to parse Atom-feeds.
